message: I propose dividing the money equally. This ensures fairness in our first round.
I think I can do better than 50/50, but I'm willing to compromise.
I propose an equal division, considering the value of money decreases with each round due to inflation.
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy. Take it or leave it!
I propose a division that reflects the decreasing value of money over time. This ensures a fair distribution while considering the inflation effect.
